name: Cubi
description:
Cubi is a game made with Unity for a game jam by Flat226 (theme "Break the rules"), on the weekend of november 2016 the 11th, by Fernand Veyrier, Nicolas Constanty, Justine Desire and Tom Solacroup.

Try to be the first to end the race, and annoy your foes with some powerups ! The game is intended to be played with at least two controllers.
